messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about postpaid services.
How can I get Telenor Postpaid security deposit back?
What's the procedure to retrieve my postpaid security deposit?
Can I reclaim my Telenor postpaid security deposit and how?
Visit our nearest franchise along with your original CNIC for assistance on Telenor Postpaid security deposit.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about postpaid services.

Which add-on should I choose for my Telenor postpaid?

The recommended add-on for Telenor Postpaid is Data Bolt 450. You can find more details about the add-on here: https://www.telenor.com.pk/post-paid/data-bolts-450/
